name: Lunar Feud
description:
This game is an assignment of Game Design and Development 3: 3D Shooter.

For WEBGL Don't Quit Game It Stops.

My first playable game, made in only two weeks. From Scratch (Excluding Models.)

Objective:

Survive As Last As You Can. 

Feel Free to comment on your High Score.

Gameplay Hints:
  • Jump While Moving To Increase Speed. 
  • Stay Near The Spaceship.
Controls:
  • W, Up Arrow - Forward
  • S, Down Arrow Backward
  • A Left Arrow - Left
  • D, Right Arrow - Right
  • Ctrl - Crouch
  • Space - Jump
  • Escape - Pause
  • `, Left Click - Fire
Modifications:
  • Reskinned the graphics entirely.
  • Added Weapon Cooldown Instead of Ammunition.
  • Added Two Difficulties Rookie & Veteran.
  • Added High Score and Highest Achieved Wave.
  • Added Weapon Animations.
  • Added Death Effect.
  • Enemy Ragdoll.
  • Removed Double Jump. (For More Relisticness)
  • Changed the player and enemy to completely different.
  • Replaced sound effects in the game to update the sound design of the game. 
  • Modified the out-of-game menus.
  • Modified the in-game GUI.
